Wisdom: قَالَ ع فِي وَصْفِ الْقُرْآنِ شَافِعٌ مُشَفَّعٌ وَقَائِلٌ مُصَدَّقٌ
enWisdom: He (‘a) said about the Holy Qur’an: it is an intercessor whose intercession is accepted and it is a speaker whose speech is affirmed

Wisdom: مَنْ شَفَعَ لَهُ الْقُرْآنُ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ شُفِّعَ فِيهِ وَمَنْ مَحَلَ بِهِ صُدِّقَ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: One for whom the Qur’an intercedes on the Day of Judgment, its intercession for him is accepted, and one about whom it complains shall testify to [and affirm] it

Wisdom: لَا تَسْتَشْفِيَنَّ بِغَيْرِ الْقُرْآنِ فَإِنَّهُ مِنْ كُلِّ دَاءٍ شَافٍ
enWisdom: Do not seek a cure from other than the Qur’an, for indeed it is a cure for all ailments
